Articles.Content:
I would love to use my 3D SpaceMouse with KSP 1.2 but the controller settings page says it's not supported. What a bummer. I love crusin' around solidworks with this thing and would be amped if I could use it with KSP too.

Does anyone have this figured out?

It sure would be great to have this supported on other platforms.

Thank you for an amazing and fun space travel simulator!
Unfortunately not, it seems that OSX support for the driver was dropped, though the Unity asset says it still supports Mac.
